name: Murder Mystery in the Animal Kingdom
name_original: Murder Mystery in the Animal Kingdom
description:
Unravel the mystery behind a rather suspicious death with a fun cast of characters!

CONTROLS:

Use the mouse to interact with objects in the scene and speak to NPCs. To go through dialogue faster, click again. To ask an NPC a question, click on them again after speaking to them.

CREDITS:
